title: Dad's Irish Coffee
directions: Pour enough Creme de Cacao in the bottom of a coffee cup to just coat the bottom of the cup.
Fill the cup with coffee leaving room for the whipped cream.
Using a swirling motion, top the coffee with whipped cream.
Drizzle Creme de Cocoa on the whipped cream.
ingredients: "This is a recipe my Dad invented that has brought my family many a pleasant winter evening. I have tried many different Irish coffees, this is by far the best ever. If you have a problem with caffeine you can substitute decaf coffee; or we have used 1/2 decaf and 1/2 regular grounds when making the coffee."
whipped cream, canned,the dairy kind not the non-dairy whipped toppin
